name: Lovers ' Smiles 2
description:
Meet the second part of your favorite game with new levels and updated mechanics!
Mr.Smile is in a hurry on a date again. Help him to pass the quest, overcome the abyss and traps and meet Miss Smile. Draw jumps, bridges and platforms. Use the physical laws and move Mr.Smile with buttons "A" and "D".
The ink in the magic pen is endless. We do not limit your fantasy! Draw as much as you want because each puzzle can be passed in different ways!

Peculiar properties:
- 90 new levels
- Realistic physics and redesigned mechanics
- Each puzzle can be passed in different ways
- Easy operation and intuitive interface
- The gameplay is suitable for people of any age
- The game develops your fantasy, logic, knowledge of physics and the ability to draw
- Endless ink that help you to create any design
- Energetic tunes
- Steam Achievements
